== Pays de Pount == Bonjour, à mon sens, il faudrait : - renommer la page actuelle Pount en "Pays de Pount". - puis plus tard renvoyer par redirection la future page Pount vers votre page d'homonymie. --[[Utilisateur:Pascal Boulerie|Pascal Boulerie]] ([[Discussion utilisateur:Pascal Boulerie|discuter]]) 10 janvier 2014 à 14:34 (CET) PS mon adresse @ : pboulerie à voila . fr :{{notif|Pascal Boulerie}} Merci de votre réponse je suis du même avis. Je vais faire la demande de renommage. Cordialement.--[[Utilisateur:pixeltoo|pixeltoo]] ([[Discussion utilisateur:Pixeltoo|discuter]]) 11 janvier 2014 à 00:32 (CET) == [[Wikipédia:RAW/2014-01-03|RAW 2014-01-03]] == {{RAW/PdD|2014-01-03}} — [[Utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|Cantons-de-l'Est]] [[Discussion utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|discuter]] 3 janvier 2014 à 18:53 (CET) == ''The Signpost'': 01 January 2014 ==
''News, reports and features from the English Wikipedia's weekly journal about Wikipedia and Wikimedia''
* News and notes: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/News and notes|The year in review]] * In the media: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/In the media|Does Wikipedia need a medical disclaimer?]] * Book review: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/Book review|Życie Wirtualnych Dzikich]] * Discussion report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/Discussion report|Article incubator, dates and fractions, medical disclaimer]] * Traffic report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/Traffic report|A year stuck in traffic]] * WikiProject report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/WikiProject report|Where Are They Now? ''Fifth Edition'']] * Featured content: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/Featured content|2013—the trends]] * Technology report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-01/Technology report|2013: Year in review]]
'''[[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost|Read this Signpost in full]]''' · [[w:en:Wikipedia:Signpost/Single|Single-page]] · [[m:Global message delivery/Targets/Signpost|Unsubscribe]] · [[m:Global message delivery|Global message delivery]] 4 janvier 2014 à 05:25 (CET)
== Wikidata weekly summary #91 ==
[[File:Wikidata-logo-en.svg|150px|right]]
''Here's your quick overview of what has been happening around Wikidata over the last week.''
* Discussions ** [[:d:Wikidata:Project Chat#About RfD|Discussion about the RfD process]] ** [[:d:Wikidata:Project Chat#Wikisource WD:N|Discussion about Notability of Wikisource on Wikidata]] ** Open RfAs: [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for permissions/Administrator/Lymantria|Lymantria]], [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for permissions/Administrator/Lavallen|Lavallen]] * Other Noteworthy Stuff ** Wikidata reached 100000000 edits ** [[:d:User:Dexbot]] is the first bot to reach 10000000 edits ** Wikisource is due to receive Wikidata Phase 1 on January the 14th * Did you know? ** Newest properties: none ** Newest [[d:Wikidata:Task forces|task forces]]: [[:d:Wikidata:MediaWiki task force|MediaWiki task force]] ** [[d:Wikidata:Showcase items|Showcase items]]: [[:d:Q309988|Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (Q309988)]] ** Fun Fact: According to Wikidata, this is the year of [[:d:Q2014|2004 (Q2014)]] * DevelopmentWord from John ** To give this section some life, since the development team had their holidays last week meaning nothing really got done (let them have one week off at least), I'll say a few words. 2014 is a new year and thus a new start, over the last year Wikidata celebrated its first birthday which brought reflection over what Wikidata had accomplish. Therefore I want to use the start of 2014 to reflect what Wikidata can do. For my personal over view see [[:d:User:John F. Lewis/Presence|this page]]. For the summary, while it is meant to be a weekly simple update, I feel this can be used a lot more effective to put across not only what happened on Wikidata but things about Wikidata on other wikis, I am hoping to start a section over this within the next few weeks. If you have any suggestions for the summary, feel free to drop me a message at [[:m:User talk:John F. Lewis|meta]] or [[:d:User talk:John F. Lewis|Wikidata]]. Thanks. * Monthly Tasks ** [[d:Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P832|Fix a format or content violation]] for the [[d:Property:P832|Public holiday (P832)]] propery ** Hack on one of [https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/buglist.cgi?keywords=need-volunteer%2C%20&keywords_type=allwords&emailcc1=1&resolution=---&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&query_format=advanced&email1=wikidata-bugs%40lists.wikimedia.org&list_id=162515 these]. ** Help develop the next summary [[d:Wikidata:Status updates/Next|here!]] ** Contribute to a [[:d:Wikidata:Showcase|Showcase item]]
'''[[m:Wikidata/Status updates/2013 10 11|Read the full report]]''' · [[m:Global message delivery/Targets/Wikidata|Unsubscribe]] · [[:d:User:John F. Lewis|John F. Lewis]] 21:50, 8 November 2013 (UTC)
== [[:w:fr:Wikipédia:RAW/2014-01-10|RAW 2014-01-10]] ==
Regards sur l'actualité de la Wikimedia
et d'ailleurs
[[:w:fr:Wikipédia:RAW/2014-01-10|RAW 2014-01-10]]
[[File:Proposition Washington.svg|100px|link={{fullurl:w:fr:Wikipédia:Regards sur l'actualité de la Wikimedia|}}|alt=Regards sur l'actualité de la Wikimedia (RAW)]]
— [[Utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|Cantons-de-l'Est]] [[Discussion utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|discuter]] 10 janvier 2014 à 19:16 (CET) == Wikidata weekly summary #92 ==
[[File:Wikidata-logo-en.svg|150px|right]]
''Here's your quick overview of what has been happening around Wikidata over the last week.''
* Discussions ** '''[[:d:Wikidata talk:Wikisource#Notability, and other preparations for Wikisource deployment|Discussion over Wikisource's notability within Wikidata]]''' ** [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for comment/Make Symmetric & Inverse Property addition automatic and bidirectional|Make Symmetric & Inverse Property addition automatic and bidirectional]] ** Closed RfAs: [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for permissions/Administrator/Lymantria|Lymantria (Successful)]], [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for permissions/Administrator/Lavallen|Lavallen (Successful)]] * Events/Press/Blogs ** [http://aldil.org/les-activites/les-jeudis/jeudi-du-libre-du-9-janvier-2014 Presentation about Wikidata at Aldil], [[:d:Q456|Lyon, France]] * Other Noteworthy Stuff ** Wikisource is deployed to [[testwikidata:|testwikidata]] ** A group of students is working on suggestions to make it easier to add missing information. [http://lists.wikimedia.org/pipermail/wikidata-l/2014-January/003301.html They published a status report and a rough first demo.] * Did you know? ** Newest properties: [[:d:Property:P1064|track gauge]], [[:d:Property:P1060|pathogen transmission process]], [[:d:Property:P1059|CVR]], [[:d:Property:P1058|ERA Journal ID]] ** Newest [[d:Wikidata:Task forces|task forces]]: [[:d:Wikidata:Manga and Anime task force|Manga and Anime task force]] ** [[d:Wikidata:Showcase items|Showcase items]]: [[:d:Q42|Douglas Adams]] ** Fun Fact: [[:d:Q404|Does not exist (Q404)]] ** Wikidata's presence: The Dutch Wikipedia have a category for coordinating coordinates on Wikidata ([[:w:nl:Categorie:Wikipedia:Coördinaten niet op Wikidata|Categorie:Wikipedia:Coördinaten niet op Wikidata]]) * Development ** [http://lists.wikimedia.org/pipermail/wikidata-l/2014-January/003294.html Adrian Lang joins the team] ** Cirrus Search is now the default search on Wikidata and should improve [[d:Special:Search]]'s handlich of special characters for example ** Made the “in other languages” box also show up for people who have not configured a babel box ([[bugzilla:49079]]) ** No longer showing a table of content when it has less than 3 items in it to prevent it from showing up on property pages ([[bugzilla:58422]]) ** More performance improvement work ** Finishing touches on quantities datatype user interface ** Display qualifiers in non-Java Script user interface ** Prevented import of wikitext into the main namespace ([[bugzilla:47070]]) ** Split the DataValues component into more clearly defined libraries and switched Wikibase over to use these ** Switched Wikibase to use Wikibase DataModel 0.6 ** Changed development and installation workflows to make use of the dependency manager Composer ([http://lists.wikimedia.org/pipermail/wikidata-tech/2014-January/000379.html more details]) ** Made tests run with less warnings (especially in Firefox) ** Started replacing wikibase.fetchedEntities with a proper entity store * Monthly Tasks ** [[d:Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P832|Fix a format or content violation]] for the [[d:Property:P832|Public holiday (P832)]] propery ** Hack on one of [https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/buglist.cgi?keywords=need-volunteer%2C%20&keywords_type=allwords&emailcc1=1&resolution=---&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&query_format=advanced&email1=wikidata-bugs%40lists.wikimedia.org&list_id=162515 these]. ** Help develop the next summary [[d:Wikidata:Status updates/Next|here!]]
'''[[m:Wikidata/Status updates/2014 01 10|Read the full report]]''' · [[m:Global message delivery/Targets/Wikidata|Unsubscribe]] · [[:d:User:John F. Lewis|John F. Lewis]] 11 janvier 2014 à 10:34 (CET)
== L'article Emunctator est proposé à la suppression == [[Image:Icono consulta borrar.png|70px|link=|Page proposée à la suppression|gauche]] Bonjour, L’article « '''{{Lien à supprimer|1=Emunctator}}''' » est proposé à la suppression ({{cf.}} [[Wikipédia:Pages à supprimer]]). Après avoir pris connaissance des [[Wikipédia:Critères d'admissibilité des articles|critères généraux d’admissibilité des articles]] et des [[:Catégorie:Wikipédia:Admissibilité des articles|critères spécifiques]], vous pourrez [[Aide:Arguments à éviter lors d'une procédure de suppression|donner votre avis]] sur la page de discussion '''[[{{TALKPAGENAME:Emunctator}}/Suppression]]'''. Le meilleur moyen d’obtenir un consensus pour la conservation de l’article est de fournir des [[Wikipédia:Citez vos sources|sources secondaires fiables et indépendantes]]. Si vous ne pouvez trouver de telles sources, c’est que l’article n’est probablement pas admissible. N’oubliez pas que les [[Wikipédia:Principes fondateurs|principes fondateurs]] de Wikipédia ne garantissent aucun droit à avoir un article sur Wikipédia. [[Utilisateur:Enrevseluj|Enrevseluj]] ([[Discussion utilisateur:Enrevseluj|discuter]]) 14 janvier 2014 à 13:21 (CET) == [[Wikipédia:Pages à fusionner#Herbes aromatiques.2C plantes aromatiques et Fines herbes|Fusion de Herbes aromatiques, plantes aromatiques et Fines herbes]] == Bonjour Pixeltoo, Étant donné que tu as donné ton avis sur la proposition de fusion mais que les conditions ont changé, tu es invité à donner à nouveau ton avis. Amicalement, [[Utilisateur:Reptilien.19831209BE1|R]] [[[Discussion Utilisateur:Reptilien.19831209BE1|CQ, ici W9GFO]]] 16 janvier 2014 à 20:11 (CET) == [[Wikipédia:RAW/2014-01-17|RAW 2014-01-17]] == {{RAW/PdD|2014-01-17}} — [[Utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|Cantons-de-l'Est]] [[Discussion utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|discuter]] 17 janvier 2014 à 19:23 (CET) == Wikidata weekly summary #93 ==
[[File:Wikidata-logo-en.svg|150px|right]]
''Here's your quick overview of what has been happening around Wikidata over the last week.''
* [[:Wikidata:Events|Events]] ** upcoming: FOSDEM * Other Noteworthy Stuff ** Wikisource now gets its language links via Wikidata ** [[:toollabs:reasonator|Reasonator]] gets extended functionality * Did you know? ** Newest properties: [[:d:Property:P1070|PlantList-ID]], [[:d:Property:P1069|Danemark Job Code (DISCO-08)]], [[:d:Property:P1068|Instruction Set]], [[:d:Property:P1067|Thailand central administrative unit code]], [[:d:Property:P1066|student of]], [[:d:Property:P1065|archive URL]] ** [[d:Wikidata:Showcase items|Showcase items]]: [[:d:Q153|ethanol]] ** Fun Fact: [[:d:Q2001|A Space Odyssey (Q2001)]] * Development ** Enabled language links for Wikisource ** Move more part of an item page from JS to HTML to improve performance and non-JS interface ** Database performance improvements ** Work on forward compatibility for new entity types ** Introducing the EntityStore service to improve modularity * Monthly Tasks ** [[:d:Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P1001|Fix a format or content violation]] for the [[:d:Property:P1001|belongs to jurisdiction (P1001)]] property ** Contribute to a [[:d:Wikidata:Showcase|Showcase item]] ** Hack on one of [https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/buglist.cgi?keywords=need-volunteer%2C%20&keywords_type=allwords&emailcc1=1&resolution=---&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&query_format=advanced&email1=wikidata-bugs%40lists.wikimedia.org&list_id=162515 these]. ** Help develop the next summary [[d:Wikidata:Status updates/Next|here!]]
'''[[m:Wikidata/Status updates/2014 01 17|Read the full report]]''' · [[m:Global message delivery/Targets/Wikidata|Unsubscribe]] · [[:d:User:Lydia Pintscher (WMDE)|Lydia Pintscher]] using [[Utilisateur:MediaWiki message delivery|MediaWiki message delivery]] ([[Discussion utilisateur:MediaWiki message delivery|discuter]]) 19 janvier 2014 à 13:22 (CET)

''News, reports and features from the English Wikipedia's weekly journal about Wikipedia and Wikimedia''
* Op-ed: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-15/Op-ed|Licensed for reuse? Citing open-access sources in Wikipedia articles]] * News and notes: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-15/News and notes|Wikimedia Germany asks for "reworking" of Funds Dissemination Committee; should MP4 be allowed on Wikimedia sites?]] * In the media: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-15/In the media|Is Google hurting Wikipedia traffic?; "Wikipedia-Mania" in the ''New York Times'']] * WikiProject report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-15/WikiProject report|WikiProject Sociology]] * Traffic report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-15/Traffic report|The Hours are Ours]] * Technology report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-15/Technology report|Architecture Summit schedule published]]

== [[Special:redirect/page/7692863|RAW 2014-01-24]] == {{RAW/PdD|2014-01-24}} — [[Utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|Cantons-de-l'Est]] [[Discussion utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|discuter]] 24 janvier 2014 à 18:53 (CET) == Wikidata weekly summary #94 ==
[[File:Wikidata-logo-en.svg|150px|right]]
''Here's your quick overview of what has been happening around Wikidata over the last week.''
* Discussions ** [[:d:Wikidata:Project chat#P31 for animals|Discussion about using 'instance of' specific for animals]] * Events/Blogs/Press ** Next Wikidata IRC office hour on Monday, February 3rd ** FOSDEM * Other Noteworthy Stuff ** The [[:d:Wikidata:Development plan|Wikidata Development Plan]] for 2014+ has been published ** [http://tools.wmflabs.org/wikidata-todo/stats.php Wikidata stats] now also includes statistics for ranks * Did you know? ** Newest properties: [[:d:Property:P1076|ICTV virus ID]], [[:d:Property:P1075|rector]], [[:d:Property:P1074|fictional analog of]], [[:d:Property:P1073|writable file format]], [[:d:Property:P1072|readable file format]], [[:d:Property:P1071|place made]] ** [[d:Wikidata:Showcase items|Showcase items]]: [[:d:Q14560|Cactaceae]] * Development ** Daniel and Katie took part in the MediaWiki Architecture Summit in San Francisco ** [[Bugzilla:60027]] Add language to label and description field to make it less likely that people enter a label or description in a wrong language ** [[Bugzilla:58394]] Avoid throwing out of bounds error when adding new claims ** [[Bugzilla:50570]] API now reveals qualifier hashes ** [[Bugzilla:57213]] API now reveals data type ids ** [[Bugzilla:57754]] Die if wbeditentity tries to clear from an old revision id ** [[Bugzilla:55795]] Add API option to show snaks in a list rather than grouped by property ** Refactor of ChangeOp remove functionality ** Continued to move parsing and validating of values from the frontend into the backend to improve performance and make the non-JS user interface more useful ** Finished the Wikidata build script (We use it to pull together code from various git repositories into a single one for deployment) * Monthly Tasks ** [[:d:Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P1001|Fix a format or content violation]] for the [[:d:Property:P1001|belongs to jurisdiction (P1001)]] property ** Hack on one of [https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/buglist.cgi?keywords=need-volunteer%2C%20&keywords_type=allwords&emailcc1=1&resolution=---&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&query_format=advanced&email1=wikidata-bugs%40lists.wikimedia.org&list_id=162515 these]. ** Help develop the next summary [[d:Wikidata:Status updates/Next|here!]] ** Contribute to a [[:d:Wikidata:Showcase|Showcase item]]
'''[[m:Wikidata/Status updates/2014 01 24|Read the full report]]''' · [[m:Global message delivery/Targets/Wikidata|Unsubscribe]] · [[:d:User:John F. Lewis|John F. Lewis]] 25 janvier 2014 à 00:57 (CET)

* Book review: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-22/Book review|''Missing Links and Secret Histories: A Selection of Wikipedia Entries from Across the Known Multiverse'']] * Special report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-22/Special report|The few who write Wikipedia]] * News and notes: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-22/News and notes|Modification of WMF protection brought to Arbcom]] * Featured content: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-22/Featured content|Dr. Watson, I presume with the Tramp]]* Traffic report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-22/Traffic report|No show for the Globes]] * Technology report: [[w:en:Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost/2014-01-22/Technology report|Architecting the future of MediaWiki]]

{{Avertissement fusion|Modèle:Infobox Conflit militaire|Modèle:Infobox Bataille Rome antique}} == Cténidie (mollusque) == Non effectivement, ma parenthèse était en trop, j'ai rectifié, je m'était trop embarqué sur le principe de l'article anglais. Merci de la remarque!--[[Utilisateur:Ben23|Ben23]] [[[Discussion Utilisateur:Ben23|Meuh!]]] 28 janvier 2014 à 17:59 (CET) == [[:Wikipédia:RAW/2014-01-31|RAW 2014-01-31]] == {{RAW/PdD|2014-01-31}} — [[Utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|Cantons-de-l'Est]] [[Discussion utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|discuter]] 31 janvier 2014 à 19:32 (CET) == Wikidata weekly summary #95 ==
[[File:Wikidata-logo-en.svg|150px|right]]
''Here's your quick overview of what has been happening around Wikidata over the last week.''
* Discussions ** [[:d:Wikidata:Project chat#Cactaceae (Q14560) as showcase item ? P31 as a qualifier ?|Discussion over P31 as a qualifier]] ** Open RfA: [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for permissions/Administrator/Sjoerddebruin|Sjoerddebruin]] * Events/Blogs/Press ** Wikidata is at FOSDEM in Brussels, Februrary 1st-2nd * Other Noteworthy Stuff ** Quantities released on Wikidata! ** Wikisource [[:d:Wikidata:Phase 2|phase 2]] coming Februrary 25th. * Did you know? ** Newest properties: [[:d:Property:P1110|attendance]], [[:d:Property:P1109|refractive index]], [[:d:Property:P1108|electronegativity]], [[:d:Property:P1107|proportion]], [[:d:Property:P1106|sandbox-quantity]], [[:d:Property:P1104|number of pages]], [[:d:Property:P1103|number of platforms ]], [[:d:Property:P1102|flattening]], [[:d:Property:P1101|floors above ground]], [[:d:Property:P1100|number of cylinders]], [[:d:Property:P1099|masts]], [[:d:Property:P1098|number of speakers]], [[:d:Property:P1097|g-factor]], [[:d:Property:P1096|orbital eccentricity]], [[:d:Property:P1093|gross tonnage]], [[:d:Property:P1092|total produced]], [[:d:Property:P1090|redshift]], [[:d:Property:P1088|Mohs' hardness]], [[:d:Property:P1087|ELO rating]], [[:d:Property:P1086|atomic number]], [[:d:Property:P1085|LibraryThing work identifier]], [[:d:Property:P1084|EUL control number]], [[:d:Property:P1083|capacity]], [[:d:Property:P1082|population]], [[:d:Property:P1081|Human Development Index]], [[:d:Property:P1080|from narrative]], [[:d:Property:P1079|launch contractor]], [[:d:Property:P1078|valvetrain configuration]], [[:d:Property:P1077|KOATUU identifier]] * Development ** Deployed quantities to Wikidata! :) ** Made patch to make wbmergeitems more reliable [[Bugzilla::55960]] ** Wikidata edit permissions now included in [https://gerrit.wikimedia.org/r/#/c/109333/ wikimedia OAuth edit groups] ** Moved Diff repo to [https://github.com/wmde/Diff Github] ** Work put into make the frontend use backend formatters through the api ** Refactoring of the [https://github.com/wmde/ValueView ValueView extension] ** MergeItems special page merged as an experimental feature ** Our easy RDF fork is now included using composer ** Fixed wbmergeitems issues * Monthly Tasks ** [[:d:Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P1001|Fix a format or content violation]] for the [[:d:Property:P1001|belongs to jurisdiction (P1001)]] property ** Hack on one of [https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/buglist.cgi?keywords=need-volunteer%2C%20&keywords_type=allwords&emailcc1=1&resolution=---&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&query_format=advanced&email1=wikidata-bugs%40lists.wikimedia.org&list_id=162515 these]. ** Help develop the next summary [[d:Wikidata:Status updates/Next|here!]] ** Contribute to a [[:d:Wikidata:Showcase|Showcase item]]
'''[[:d:Wikidata:Status updates/2014 01 31|Read the full report]]''' · [[m:Global message delivery/Targets/Wikidata|Unsubscribe]] · [[:d:User:John F. Lewis|John F. Lewis]] 1 février 2014 à 00:37 (CET)

== [[:w:fr:Wikipédia:RAW/2014-02-07|RAW 2014-02-07]] == {{RAW/PdD|2014-02-07}} — [[Utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|Cantons-de-l'Est]] [[Discussion utilisateur:Cantons-de-l'Est|discuter]] 7 février 2014 à 19:36 (CET) == Wikidata weekly summary #96 ==
[[File:Wikidata-logo-en.svg|150px|right]]
''Here's your quick overview of what has been happening around Wikidata over the last week.''
* Discussions ** [[:d:Wikidata:Project chat#Name of person|Discussion over the naming of people]] ** [[:d:Wikidata:Project chat#Population|Discussion over population]] ** Successful RfA: [[:d:Wikidata:Requests for permissions/Administrator/Sjoerddebruin|Sjoerddebruin]] * Events/Blogs/Press ** See the office hours logs at [[:m:IRC office hours/Office hours 2014-02-03|meta]] * Other Noteworthy Stuff ** See the FOSDEM [https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/16VDTk9Lo9YU-Q-lj68984o8cGLZDwTDVUfazsB4V1GQ/edit slides] ** Thiemo joins the Wikidata development team * Development ** More work on badges by Bene* ** Lots of Lua improvements by hoo (separate announcement with details soon) ** Created backend Time parsers (yet another necessary step towards doing more in the backend instead of in Java Script in the frontend) ** Automatic builds created, tested and deployed to beta labs every day! ** Investigate Elastic Search as possible backend for queries ** Made Wikibase Query work with our new component structure * Monthly Tasks ** [[:d:Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P1001|Fix a format or content violation]] for the [[:d:Property:P1001|belongs to jurisdiction (P1001)]] property ** Hack on one of [https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/buglist.cgi?keywords=need-volunteer%2C%20&keywords_type=allwords&emailcc1=1&resolution=---&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&query_format=advanced&email1=wikidata-bugs%40lists.wikimedia.org&list_id=162515 these]. ** Help develop the next summary [[d:Wikidata:Status updates/Next|here!]] ** Contribute to a [[:d:Wikidata:Showcase|Showcase item]]
